title: [NEW] Having issues Patching 5.18? Click Here!
body:
So there you are...just hanging out and getting ready to play League of Legends.  I mean, patch 5.18 is gonna be what the World Championships are played on!  We gotta check it out, right?  However, this time when you try to patch League of Legends you encounter a patching error.  You don't know what it is, but it's there...We imagine your reaction looks something like this...

http://i.imgur.com/JdLM13V.gif

Fear not...We've got you covered and we're going to get you back in to League of Legends as quickly as possible!  The solution to your problem can depend on your symptoms so take a look below as these links should fix most issues!


-----------------------------------------

> ***Launcher/Patcher never pops up, or disappears after you press "LAUNCH"***

This can be caused by corruption with the patcher itself or it failed to properly self-patch. Additionally, it may be due to some issues with the configuration of your computer system's permissions (meaning it can't properly save the files in the correct location). To resolve this, make sure to complete all the steps in our [Patching Issues Article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues)!


> ***Patcher stops/errors out at 33%, Patcher fails at 99%, or a general "Unspecified Error has occurred" message***

These are usually connection related errors. Either your computer is unable to maintain a stable connection, or a 3rd party security program is blocking League of Legends from properly patching. Many of the most common Anti-virus programs [have already whitelisted LoL](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq3), however make sure to update yours to the latest version!

Also, even though you may have set specific exceptions in place before for your security program, League of Legends has gone through a major update. Therefore, your security program may recognize the old version of League of Legends, but not the new version. 

To get these issues resolved ASAP, make sure to go through our [Connection Issues Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)!

--------------------------------------------------------------

*If after completing these steps, you still do not see the glorious orange 'LAUNCH' button, feel free to drop us a post in this thread!  Rioters as well as Wrenchmen volunteers will be on hand to respond and provide some additional help!*

replies.body: hi guys pls tell me what happend with my points in the ward . It shows me dat i have 0 points but i played a lot and i didnt get banned{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
hi guys, my problem is i already get in the game, the sound still on but the lol screen not coming up, i press alt+tab but still no coming up, can anyone help me???
lol

Guys after lobby on a rank game or costum when open lol to play the game then bugsplat error/// i tried to fix this  like deleting some files on rads etc (nothing happens)  ,disable firewalls , run as admin etc...  can u help me?? all drivers , graphic cards windows updated...

Hey guys, Finally convinced my fiancee to play league, and every time she goes to login it doesn't go through and says it's something with the connection. The internet is working fine on everything else, I've tried disabling the firewall, and I've reinstalled the client, still not working. Any fixes?
when im trying to update the 9/21 patch 5.18, it is stuck at 0%

I just got black screen and crash first time it happens this patch
Btw it was ranked so bye bye lp and the worst is my team have no fault of bug/crash that i cant fix

Hello guys.
I've tried to fix my league 2 days and nothing.
When last patch 5.18 downloaded and start apply, client freeze on 61, 71 or 80% and nothing. I've tried to uninstall LoL, reinstall AdobeAIR, .net framework 3.5.1... everything and i still can not play.
Check following link for last Log: [(http://upload.wrenchmen.org/2imjnR)].
If somebody has an idea how to fix it please help.

Best regards

hi finally after 5 days of breaking my head and waiting for the files to scanned(i reached 80k files scanning TWICE) my League is working . All i did was reinstall League. I didnt even download the new set up just re installed from the old one. I dont have adobeAIR or net Framework. The download did take more than 24 hours though. Just let it download for a day or two. I havent yet played bu will do anytime soon. I AM SO GLAD I CAN SEE THE GLORIOUS LAUNCH BUTTON AFTER 5 DAYS.
I cant play a game of lol right now AT ALL, i tried to play ranked it crashed, i try to play normal it crashes....wth

BUG SPLAT

Can you try [**Repairing Your Client**](http://www.wrenchmen.org/resources/knowledgebase/1?view=article)?

I couldn't get to the login screen yesterday, so I repaired my client and it worked. Now the next day, it's doing the same thing again, after I hit launch the login screen doesn't appear. Why does this happen ? I really hope I don't have to repair the client everytime I wanna play league -.-"

Hey kivvibear,

It may be due to a connection issue. Can you check to see if League of Legends is added to any antivirus/firewall applications?

Hey Wuks,

Thanks for replying. I actually fixed it by doing a disk defrag, and now it works =3

hi Wuks will check the thread out. I am right now on 78k files scanning x.x Also maybe this will help you understand my problem better. My new Patch that is 5.18 DID update but i am guessing there was another update(maybe for umm the background screen change) that is what is not updating PLUS my update started from 33% like directly from 0>>>33% like usually it reaches 33% then scans files and all but this time it directly started at 33% which was too weird. thanks

I am a girl o.o I don't understand everything o.o
well this embarrassing also I dont want to restart my patch because I reached too far at this point, yesterday i restarted at 43k deleted that folder but nothing happened now I reached 79k and I feel hesitant because i dont trust anything anymore. I have been dreaming about playing league too! I NEED TO PLAY THE GAME, WHY IS THIS SO DEPRESSING? AND I DID REPAIR IT!

okay so I will be honest I see a hope.    C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\lol_air_client\releases\{highest version number}

        Delete the following files:

    - releasemanifest
    - S_OK

        Open the Deploy folder
        Delete the following folders/files:

    - lib (folder)
    - META-INF (folder)
    - lolclient.swf (file)
    - lolclient.exe (file)
    - lolclient.swf (file)
    - locale.properties (file)
did this but did not delete   - lolclient.exe (file)    - lolclient.swf (file)   - lolclient.swf (file) (I GUESS I FELT TOO SCARED TO DELETE THE LOL CLIENT AND THE REST I GUESS I FORGOT) so anyways i then ran it with the admin and finally the update started with 0% instead of 33% thats new so i am excited *fingers crossed* thanks
okay I know I am typing too much but i am just excited. It has loaded till 7% now **THAT IS SOMETHING**
okay so it got stuck on 33% scanning files blahhhhhhhhhhhhhh 8k till now

I really like playing the game but this is getting extremely frustrating

Hey Dw1se,

Can you try the solutions provided in [**this thread**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/qGY56UB4-comprehensive-troubleshooting-your-patching-issues) and let me know if anything works?

I found the solution that worked for me! {{champion:115}}    Here is what I did:

C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\solutions\lol_game_client_sln

and delete the contents of this folder. Re-run the client. This'll force a repatch.
Awesome! Glad to hear you found something that worked for you!
